text:
use the implementation of Holt-Winters Exponential Smoothing provided by the Statsmodels
library. This model has hyperparameters that control the nature of the exponential performed
for the series, trend, and seasonality, speciﬁcally:
 smoothing level (alpha): the smoothing coeﬃcient for the level.
 smoothing slope (beta): the smoothing coeﬃcient for the trend.
 smoothing seasonal (gamma): the smoothing coeﬃcient for the seasonal component.
